scripts.dp: tsc scripts/dp.mts --skipLibCheck --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --module ESNext --target ESNext --outDir ./dist --moduleResolution node && node dist/dp.mjs
scripts.css: tsc scripts/css.mts --skipLibCheck --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --module ESNext --target ESNext --outDir ./dist --moduleResolution node && node dist/css.mjs
